snippet: Cynthia von Buhler decided on a somewhat novel way to recreate the Depression-era murder of her grandfather: a dollhouse.
abstract: Cynthia von Buhler decided on a somewhat novel way to recreate the Depression-era murder of her grandfather: a dollhouse.

headline.main: Using a Dollhouse to Reconstruct a Murder, 77 Years Later
headline.print_headline: Recreating a Killing In Doll-Size Detail
